dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: This idiot thinks he's a pirate

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: Didn't I just talk to you?

dialogue.name: Carl
dialogue.text: Ye be standin' on the brink o' Davey Jone's Locker, ye Scallywag! Shiver me timbers!!!!

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: Carl, you sound like a complete idiot.

dialogue.name: Scook
dialogue.text: But seriously, be careful. I had to feed you some fish to revive you.
